column4: nope i went to change the password and i might have accidentally cleared the input field and put something in but now i dont know what to do i tried to do everything on  http://psychocats.net/ubuntu/resetpassword but i get an error
Authentication Token Manipulation Error is the error i get i tried pwconv but it says that it couldn't lock /etc/passwd
did you happen to change your computer name (aka host name)?
and why where you using "pwconv"?  I had to look up what that app did - not commonly used, i'd say.
